mapper.select: SELECT o.order_id AS orderId, a.auction_title AS productName, (SELECT ai.auction_image_url FROM auction_images ai WHERE ai.auction_id = a.auction_id LIMIT 1) AS imageUrl, o.order_amount AS amount FROM orders o JOIN auctions a ON o.auction_id = a.auction_id WHERE o.user_id = #{userId} AND o.order_id = #{orderId} AND o.order_status = 'pending'::order_status_enum
